column4: hmm, I need some sort of bash trickery to make 'xvfb wkhtmltopdf' translate to just 'wkhtmltopdf' so I dont have to keep changing it on the server
how do I alias xvfb to just do nothing, or possible just execute its argument
open that file as root, scroll down, enter a line like alias mycommand="this was the original ubuntu command" , save file, once in a new terminal, can use your mycommand expression
